column4: Does anybody know of any good video editting software (I'm new to making vids but don't want TOO user frienly software that holds me back later on)
video editing you mean nonlinear? (i.e. put many videos together, do transitions, and such?)
you can do it through the terminal, or you could use VLC or avidemux
it might not be the *only* way, but it certainly is one way
